data.title: Tull Family
data.text:
Fifth Generation

12. Simon De5 Montfort {[Count of Evreux} (Amaury De4, Simon I Seigneur3, Amauri (Amaury) De2, William De1 Hainault) was born in MONTFORT, Eure., France about 1117/1121. Simon died March 13, 1181 at 62 years of age. His body was interred in Cathedral, EVREUX, normandy, France.

He married Maud Countess Of Evreux in of, France, about 1150. Maud was born in of, France about 1117. Maud was baptized a member of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints April 27, 1936. Temple Code: SLAKE. Maud and Simon Iii Le Montfort were sealed September 23, 1938. Temple Code: temple code unknown. She was endowed April 26, 1990. Temple Code: SLAKE.

Simon was baptized a member of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints April 19, 1933. Temple Code: temple code unknown. He was endowed April 28, 1933. Temple Code: SG. He was sealed to his parents September 23, 1938. Temple Code: temple code unknown.

Simon De Montfort [Count of Evreux and Maud Countess Of Evreux had the following children:

16 i. Amauri De6 Montfort {[Count of Evreux} was born in of, EVREUX, normandy, France about 1151. He married Mabel Fitzrobert in of, Gloucestershire, England, about 1170. Mabel was born in of, Gloucestershire, England about 1150. Mabel was the daughter of William Fitzrobert and Hawise De Beaumont. Mabel died 1198 at 48 years of age. Mabel was baptized a member of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints May 5, 1938. Temple Code: temple code unknown. She was endowed December 21, 1938. Temple Code: SL.

He was endowed June 19, 1992. Temple Code: BOISE. He was sealed to his parents August 4, 1992. Temple Code: BOISE. Line 3121 from GEDCOM File not recognizable or too long: BAPL 19 APR 1933 SGEORG

17 ii. Simon De Montfort [Seigneur de Mon was born in of, Montfort Amaury, Ile De France, France about 1153. Simon died before January 1188. His body was interred in Haute-Bruyere. He married Amicia Harcourt [COUNTESS OF LEI in of, Leicestershire, England, about 1169. Amicia was born in of, Leicester, Leicestershire, England about 1160. Amicia died September 3, 1215 at 55 years of age. Amicia and Simon De Montfort [Seigneur de Mon were sealed April 3, 1992. Temple Code: PROVO.

Simon was baptized a member of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints April 15, 1935. Temple Code: LOGAN. Simon and Amicia Harcourt [COUNTESS OF LEI were sealed April 3, 1992. Temple Code: PROVO. He was endowed September 29, 1992. Temple Code: PROVO. Line 3129 from GEDCOM File not recognizable or too long: TITL [Seigneur de Montfort] Line 3140 from GEDCOM File not recognizable or too long: SLGC BEF -1970

18 iii. Bertrade De Montfort_(Evreux [COUNTESS OF CHE was born in of, Chester, England about 1155. Bertrade died July 12, 1189 in EVREUX, France, Eure, France, at 34 years of age. She married twice. She married Hugh "Of Kevelioc" Chester [VISCOUNT D'AVRA in of, MONTFORT, normandy, France, 1169. Hugh was born in of, Kevelioc, Merionethshire, Wales 1147. Hugh was the son of Ranulph "De Gernon" Chester [VISCOUNT D'AVRA and Maud Fitzrobert [COUNTESS OF CHE. Hugh died June 30, 1181 in England, Leek, Staffordshire, England, at 33 years of age. His body was interred in Chester, Chester, Cheshire, England. He was christened in (Abt 34-1181). Hugh was baptized a member of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints June 10, 1933. Temple Code: temple code unknown. He was endowed August 22, 1934. Temple Code: temple code unknown. (See Hugh "Of Kevelioc" Chester [VISCOUNT D'AVRA for the continuation of this line.) She married Hugh "Of Kevelioc" Meschines [EARL OF CHESTER in of, MONTFORT, normandy, France, 1169. Hugh was born in Kevelioc, Merionethshire, Wales 1147. Hugh was the son of Ranulph "De Gernon" Chester [VISCOUNT D'AVRA and Maud Fitzrobert [COUNTESS OF CHE. Hugh died June 30, 1181 in Leek, Staffordshire, England, at 33 years of age. His body was interred in Chester, Chestershire, England. Hugh was baptized a member of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints June 10, 1933. Temple Code: temple code unknown. He was endowed August 22, 1934. Temple Code: temple code unknown. Hugh and Bertrade De Montfort_(Evreux [COUNTESS OF CHE were sealed April 22, 1972. Temple Code: ARIZO. He was sealed to his parents February 20, 1991. Temple Code: SGEOR. (See Hugh "Of Kevelioc" Meschines [EARL OF CHESTER for the continuation of this line.)

She was christened in (14-1169). Bertrade was baptized a member of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints March 7, 1931. Temple Code: SLAKE. She was endowed April 24, 1931. Temple Code: SL. Bertrade and Hugh "Of Kevelioc" Meschines [EARL OF CHESTER were sealed April 22, 1972. Temple Code: ARIZO. She was sealed to her parents July 28, 1992. Temple Code: LVEGA. Line 1938 from GEDCOM File not recognizable or too long: NAME Bertrade De /MONTFORT (EVREUX)/ Line 1939 from GEDCOM File not recognizable or too long: TITL [COUNTESS OF CHESTER]/
